name: Expresso Feérico
description:
Put the coffee boxes in their correct row!

CONTROLS

Player 1

A and D - Move

Space - Push

Player 2

Left and Right Key - Move

P - Pull

General

Esc - Closes the game

Special Thanks!:

Juliana Ribas Sauter for the Arkwork and Pixel Art

Jeniffer Salem for the Game Design

And everyone else of JOGOS4 2019!
